analysis.description:
RareClaim.purchase (/unique_chucks/10/0x736638c1e70c3856487776bc3485c24cca8e0135.sol#82-115) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(rare.owner != msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/10/0x736638c1e70c3856487776bc3485c24cca8e0135.sol#87)
	- time_diff >= fiveHoursInSeconds (/unique_chucks/10/0x736638c1e70c3856487776bc3485c24cca8e0135.sol#89-93)
	- require(bool)(msg.value >= rare.price) (/unique_chucks/10/0x736638c1e70c3856487776bc3485c24cca8e0135.sol#95-97)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x736638c1e70c3856487776bc3485c24cca8e0135.sol:
